settings.code:
<style>
    .ug_section_box h2 {
        color: #000;
        font-size: 1.25vw;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 1.667vw;
    }

    .ug_section_box h3 {
        color: #000;
        font-size: 1.042vw;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 1.458vw;
    }

    .ug_section_box h4 {
        color: #000;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 1.25vw;
    }

    .ug_section_box span {
        color: #A4A4A6;
        font-size: 0.625vw;
        line-height: 0.625vw;
    }

    .ug_section_box img {
        border-radius: 4px;

    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 {
        padding: 4.167vw 0;
    }

    .ug_section_box {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .blog_title {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        margin-bottom: 2.083vw;
    }

    .blog_title h2 {
        font-size: 1.875vw;
        font-weight: 700;
        line-height: 1.875vw;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }

    .blog_title a {
        color: #00CC88;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 0.833vw;
    }
    .blog_title a:hover{
        opacity: .7;
    }
    .blog_title a svg {
        width: 0.9375vw;
        height: 0.9375vw;
    }

    .blog_img {
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .blog_img img {
        transition: .4s;
    }

    .item:hover img {
        transform: scale(1.1);
    }

    /* ug_blog_box_1 */
    .ug_blog_box_1 .ug_section_box {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.042vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .ug_section_box>div>p {
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 0.625vw;
        color: #00CC88;
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        gap: 1.042vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item {
        max-width: 15.885vw;
        position: relative;

    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .blog_list .item {
        margin-bottom: 1.042vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item img {
        height: 9.375vw;
        width: 100%;
        object-fit: cover;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left div:nth-child(3) {
        max-width: 28.333vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left div:nth-child(3) img {
        height: 21.875vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item h3,
    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item h2 {
        margin: 0.625vw 0 0.417vw 0;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item h3 {
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item h2 {
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item .blog_tag {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0.625vw;
        left: 0.625vw;
        padding: 0.208vw 0.417vw;
        font-size: 0.729vw;
        color: #fff;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.50);
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item p {
        color: #727273;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        line-height: 1.25vw;
        margin: 1.042vw 0 0 0;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .right {
        max-width: 20.104vw;
        width: 100%;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item {
        padding: 1.042vw 0;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #EAEAEA;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item a {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        width: 100%;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item img {
        width: 7.396vw;
        height: 5.729vw;
        object-fit: cover;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item .blog_text {
        padding: 0.3125vw 0;
        max-width: 11.667vw;

    }
    .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item .blog_text h3{
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }
    .ug_blog_box_1 .right h4 {
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_1 .right div:last-child {
        border: none;
    }

    /* ug_blog_box_2 */
    .ug_blog_box_2 {
        padding: 3.125vw 0;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box {
        padding: 2.865vw 5.729vw;
        box-shadow: 0vw 0.417vw 1.042vw rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 4.167vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box img {
        max-width: 6.25vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form h2 {
        font-size: 1.458vw;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 1.458vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form h2 span {
        font-size: 1.458vw;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #000;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form p {
        color: #727273;
        font-size: 1.042vw;
        line-height: 1.042vw;
        margin: 0.78125vw 0 2.083vw 0;
    }

    .ug_form .ug_blog_input {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.458vw;
        position: relative;
    }

    .ug_form .ug_blog_input .Polaris-FormLayout {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 26.042vw;
    }

    .ug_form .ug_blog_input .Polaris-FormLayout .element-group input {
        width: 100%;
        height: 2.5vw;
        border-radius: 3.125vw;
        background: #F2F2F2;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        color: #333;
    }

    .ug_form .ug_blog_input .submit-btn {
        width: 8.542vw;
        height: 2.5vw;
        border-radius: 3.125vw;
        background: #000;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        color: #FFF;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .ug_form .ug_blog_input .submit-btn:hover {
        background: #00CC88;
    }

    .ug_form .ug_blog_input .alert-success {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
    }

    /* ug_blog_box_3 */
    .ug_blog_box_3 {
        padding: 3.125vw 0;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog {
        display: flex;
        gap: 2.083vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left {
        position: relative;
        max-width: 32.8125vw;
        width: 100%;
        height: 20.833vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 20.833vw;
        object-fit: cover;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left h2 {
        color: #fff;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 1.458vw;
        left: 1.458vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right {
        width: 100%;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item {
        padding: 1.042vw 0;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #EAEAEA;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item a {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        width: 100%;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item img {
        width: 8.542vw;
        height: 5.521vw;
        object-fit: cover;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item .blog_text {
        padding: 0.78125vw 0;
        max-width: 21.094vw;
        flex: 1;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right h3 {
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right div:nth-child(1) {
        padding-top: 0;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right div:last-child {
        padding-bottom: 0;
        border: none;
    }

    /* ug_blog_box_4 */
    .ug_blog_box_4 .left,
    .ug_blog_box_4 .ug_buying_blog .right .item .blog_text {
        order: 1;
    }

    /* ug_blog_box_5 */
    .ug_blog_box_5 {
        padding: 3.125vw 0;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_5 .blog_list {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        gap: 2.083vw;
    }
    .ug_blog_box_5 .blog_list .item{
        flex: 1;
    }
    .ug_blog_box_5 .ug_section_box h3 {
        margin: 1.042vw 0 0.417vw 0;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        display: -webkit-box;
        -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
        -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_5 .ug_section_box span {
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        line-height: 1.25vw;
    }

    .ug_blog_box_5 .blog_img img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 13.281vw;
        object-fit: cover;
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .ug_section_box h2 {
            font-size: 5.333vw;
            line-height: 7.467vw;
        }

        .ug_section_box h3,
        .ug_section_box h4 {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 6.4vw;
        }

        .ug_section_box span {
            font-size: 3.733vw;
            line-height: 6.4vw;
        }

        .blog_title {
            margin-bottom: 7.467vw;
        }

        .blog_title h2 {
            font-size: 6.4vw !important;
            line-height: 6.4vw !important;
        }
        .blog_title a{
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 4.267vw;
        }
        .blog_title a svg{
            width: 4.8vw;
            height: 4.8vw;
        }
        /* ug_blog_box_1 */
        .ug_blog_box_1 {
            padding: 10.667vw 4.8vw;
        }

        .ug_section_box {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .ug_section_box {
            gap: 16vw;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left {
            width: 100%;
            gap: 5.333vw
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .ug_section_box>div>p {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 3.2vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .blog_list {
            order: 2;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .blog_list .item {
            max-width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .blog_list div:last-child {
            margin: 0;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left div:nth-child(3) {
            max-width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 5.333vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item img,
        .ug_blog_box_1 .left div:nth-child(3) img {
            height: auto;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item p {
            font-size: 3.733vw;
            margin: 3.2vw 0 0 0;
            line-height: 5.333vw;

        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item h3,
        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item h2 {
            margin: 3.2vw 0 2.133vw 0;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .right {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item {
            padding: 5.333vw 0;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item .blog_text {
            max-width: 100%;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .right .item .blog_img {
            display: none;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_1 .left .item .blog_tag {
            top: 3.2vw;
            left: 3.2vw;
            padding: 1.067vw 2.133vw;
            font-size: 3.733vw;
        }

        /* ug_blog_box_2 */
        .ug_blog_box_2 {
            padding: 8vw 4.8vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box {
            padding: 10.667vw 5.333vw;
            gap: 5.333vw;
            flex-direction: column;
            box-shadow: 0vw 2.133vw 5.333vw rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
        }

        .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box img {
            max-width: 21.333vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form {
            text-align: center;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form h2 {
            font-size: 6.4vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
            padding: 0 8vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form h2 span {
            font-size: 6.4vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_2 .ug_section_box .ug_form p {
            font-size: 3.733vw;
            line-height: 5.333vw;
            margin: 3.2vw 0 5.333vw 0;
        }

        .ug_form .ug_blog_input {
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 2.133vw;
        }

        .ug_form .ug_blog_input .Polaris-FormLayout {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .ug_form .ug_blog_input .Polaris-FormLayout .element-group input {
            height: 12.8vw;
            border-radius: 16vw;
            font-size: 3.733vw;
        }

        .ug_form .ug_blog_input .submit-btn {
            width: 100%;
            height: 12.8vw;
            border-radius: 16vw;
            font-size: 3.733vw;
        }

        .ug_form .ug_blog_input .alert-success {
            position: relative;
        }

        /* ug_blog_box_3 */
        .ug_blog_box_3,
        .ug_blog_box_5 {
            padding: 8vw 4.8vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog {
            gap: 5.333vw;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left img {
            height: auto;
            margin-bottom: 2.667vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left h2 {
            position: relative;
            bottom: 0;
            left: 0;
            color: #000;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item .blog_img {
            display: none;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item .blog_text {
            padding: 0;
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right>div:nth-child(1) {
            border-top: 1px solid #EAEAEA;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .right .item {
            padding: 5.333vw 0 !important;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_3 .ug_buying_blog .left {
            order: 0;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_5 .blog_list {
            width: 100%;
            overflow-y: auto;
            gap: 3.2vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_5 .blog_list .item {
            flex: none;
            max-width: 80vw;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_5 .ug_section_box h2 {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 6.4vw;
            margin: 3.2vw 0 2.133vw 0;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_5 .ug_section_box span {
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 12px;
        }

        .ug_blog_box_5 .blog_img img {
            height: 50.667vw;
        }
    }
</style>
